game.title: Find the stolen treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the golden idol from the pirate hideout.
game.description: The pirates have stolen the legendary Golden Idol from the museum. Travel to their hideout and retrieve it before they sail away with their loot.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a new weapon

task.objective: Gather clues about the pirate hideout location.
task.description: Speak to local fishermen and sailors for information about the pirates and their hideout location. Collect at least three clues before proceeding.

task.objective: Locate the pirate hideout using the gathered clues.
task.description: Follow the trail of clues to find the pirate hideout. Be prepared for a fight as you approach.

task.objective: Retrieve the Golden Idol from the pirates.
task.description: Infiltrate the pirate hideout and retrieve the Golden Idol. Be sure to avoid detection and defeat any guards that get in your way.
